mapper.select: SELECT * FROM homebbs WHERE bbsAvailable =1 ORDER BY bbsID DESC limit 5;
SELECT * FROM homebbsr WHERE bbsrAvailable =1 ORDER BY bbsID DESC limit 5;
mapper.insert: insert into homebbs( bbsId, content, writer, bbsDate, likecount, dislikecount, bbsAvailable, replyCount ) values ( #{bbsId}, #{content}, #{writer}, now(), #{likecount}, #{dislikecount}, #{bbsAvailable}, #{replyCount} )

insert into homebbsr( bbsId, bbsrId, userId, reply, bbsrDate, likedMember, dislikedMember, bbsrAvailable ) values ( #{bbsId}, #{bbsrId}, #{userId}, #{reply}, now(), #{likedMember}, #{dislikedMember}, #{bbsrAvailable} )
